nonCompete.detailedExplanation: West Virginia Uniform Trade Secrets Act and common law allow reasonable non-competes. Must protect legitimate business interest (trade secrets, customer relationships, specialized training). Reasonableness based on time, geography, and scope. Typically 1-2 years reasonable.
nonCompete.suggestion: Limit to 1-2 years, reasonable geographic scope, protect legitimate interests
nonCompete.actionRequired: Ensure reasonableness in time, geography, and scope
nonCompete.alternativeLanguage: reasonable non-compete restrictions protecting legitimate business interests for up to 2 years
nonCompete.source: West Virginia case law and statutes

salaryHistory.detailedExplanation: West Virginia has no law prohibiting salary history questions

payTransparency.detailedExplanation: No requirement to disclose salary ranges

backgroundChecks.message: Background checks permitted at any stage
backgroundChecks.detailedExplanation: No ban-the-box law. Criminal history inquiries permitted on applications. Follow federal FCRA requirements.
process: Follow pre-adverse and adverse action procedures

minimumWage.detailedExplanation: West Virginia state minimum wage is $8.75/hour, higher than federal minimum. Applies to employers with 6 or more employees.
minimumWage.requirement: Must pay $8.75/hour minimum (for employers with 6+ employees)
minimumWage.actionRequired: Ensure compliance with state minimum wage

paidLeave.detailedExplanation: West Virginia does not require paid sick leave, paid family leave, or vacation

drugScreening.detailedExplanation: West Virginia allows drug testing. Drug-free workplace programs provide workers' compensation premium discounts.
drugScreening.bestPractice: Consider certified drug-free workplace program for workers' comp discounts

atWill.detailedExplanation: West Virginia recognizes at-will employment with limited exceptions

arbitration.detailedExplanation: Arbitration clauses generally enforceable under FAA

finalPay.message: Final wages due next regular payday or within 72 hours
finalPay.detailedExplanation: Discharged employees: within 72 hours. Resigned employees: next regular payday.
finalPay.requirement: Pay within 72 hours if terminated, next payday if quit
finalPay.source: West Virginia Wage Payment and Collection Act

rightToWork.message: West Virginia is a RIGHT TO WORK state (2016)
rightToWork.detailedExplanation: Union membership and dues payment cannot be required as condition of employment

breaks.message: Meal breaks REQUIRED for 6+ hour shifts
breaks.detailedExplanation: Employees working 6+ consecutive hours must receive at least 20-minute meal break. Break period is unpaid if employee is completely relieved of duties.
breaks.requirement: Provide 20-minute meal break for 6+ hour shifts
breaks.actionRequired: Ensure meal break policy complies with state law

payFrequency.message: Must pay employees at least semi-monthly
payFrequency.detailedExplanation: Regular employees must be paid at least twice per month (semi-monthly). Manual laborers and certain workers must be paid weekly or bi-weekly.
payFrequency.requirement: Pay at least semi-monthly (twice per month)
payFrequency.actionRequired: Establish semi-monthly or more frequent pay schedule
